subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Eric Devendorf scored a career-high 34 points and Demetris Nichols added 15 last night as Syracuse rallied for a 79-73 victory against visiting South Alabama in the first round of the N.I.T.
snippet: Eric Devendorf scored a career-high 34 points and Demetris Nichols added 15 last night as Syracuse rallied for a 79-73 victory against visiting South Alabama in the first round of the N.I.T.
